Key Match Events: Stephen Curry left midway through the fourth quarter with a left ankle injury
Andrew Wiggins scored 29 points with a 3-pointer at the 3:47 mark of the fourth that made it a one-point game
James Harden contributed 23 points and 11 assists making all nine of his free throws
Pre-Game Insights: A moment of silence was held for Hall of Famer Al Attles, the former Warriors player, coach, general manager and ambassador who died at his East Bay home on Aug. 20 at age 87
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Curry added 18 with six assists but left for good at the 7:55 mark
Ivica Zubac had 23 points and 18 rebounds
The Clippers spoiled the Golden State Warriors’ home opener with a 112-104 win Sunday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers scored 58 points in the paint — 30 by halftime
Buddy Hield went 3 for 14 — 1 of 9 from 3-point range — for eight points coming off the bench in his home debut for Golden State
The Clippers return home to host Portland on Wednesday, kicking off a five-game homestand
Golden State will host New Orleans on Tuesday for the first of back-to-back games over two days against the Pelicans
Others: A video tribute showed during a first-quarter timeout
Before introductions and the national anthem, a moment of silence was held for Hall of Famer Al Attles
